# cumulativeBestAccuracyForNavigationTime

**Instance Property**

The total time spent tracking the current location at the best accuracy for navigation.

## Declaration

```swift
var cumulativeBestAccuracyForNavigationTime: Measurement<UnitDuration> { get }
```

## Reading location services use

- **cumulativeBestAccuracyTime**: The total time spent tracking the current location at the best accuracy.
- **cumulativeNearestTenMetersAccuracyTime**: The total time spent tracking the current location to an accuracy of 10 meters.
- **cumulativeHundredMetersAccuracyTime**: The total time spent tracking the current location to an accuracy of 100 meters.
- **cumulativeKilometerAccuracyTime**: The total time spent tracking the current location to an accuracy of 1 kilometer.
- **cumulativeThreeKilometersAccuracyTime**: The total time spent tracking the current location to an accuracy of 3 kilometers.
